about_the_game:
The adventurers are back!

Join Jack, Henry, Jazzy and Blanky as they explore the Traplands.
Sail between the mysterious islands and solve the puzzles of the ancients.
Will you be able to uncover all the secrets in this one of a kind adventure??

    Take on an adventure like no other

  • Travel through the dangerous world of Bloody Trapland.
  • Find secrets, unlock rewards, solve puzzles and unravel the plot.
  • Go at it alone, or play with others. This game is made with both heavily in mind.
  • A true challenge that won't hold your hand, do you have what it takes?

    Join up with other Traplanders

  • Local on the same screen, supports both keyboard and controller.
  • Couch Play, supports Steam link.
  • Online with dedicated servers, no setup needed.
  • Combine local and online play.
  • Browse public games and join other Traplanders.

    Create, Share & Play

  • Powerful in game editor, all the tools we had making this game is at your disposal
  • Edit and play any level from the game on your own, or create new once from scratch.
  • Put together your very own adventure and have others play it in the challenge mode.
  • Create any arcade style levels that you can think off, your imagination is the limit.
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Story mode with 50+ Levels.
  • Epic Boss battles.
  • Hidden collectables and secrets.
  • Challenge mode with randomly generated worlds.
  • 31 legitimate Achievements.
  • Easy to pick up, hard to master.
  • Up to 4 player co-op.
  • Online with dedicated servers, no setup needed.
  • Local and Couch play, supports Steam Link.
  • Over the top powerful in game editor with full workshop support.
  • Unlockable content only awarded to the persistent.
  • Mysterious Skunk.


Early Beta Access

Almost 2 years of the development was in Early Access to gather direct feedback from players to improve the experience.


About the Game

The adventurers are back!

Join Jack, Henry, Jazzy and Blanky as they explore the Traplands.
Sail between the mysterious islands and solve the puzzles of the ancients.
Will you be able to uncover all the secrets in this one of a kind adventure??

    Take on an adventure like no other

  • Travel through the dangerous world of Bloody Trapland.
  • Find secrets, unlock rewards, solve puzzles and unravel the plot.
  • Go at it alone, or play with others. This game is made with both heavily in mind.
  • A true challenge that won't hold your hand, do you have what it takes?

    Join up with other Traplanders

  • Local on the same screen, supports both keyboard and controller.
  • Couch Play, supports Steam link.
  • Online with dedicated servers, no setup needed.
  • Combine local and online play.
  • Browse public games and join other Traplanders.

    Create, Share & Play

  • Powerful in game editor, all the tools we had making this game is at your disposal
  • Edit and play any level from the game on your own, or create new once from scratch.
  • Put together your very own adventure and have others play it in the challenge mode.
  • Create any arcade style levels that you can think off, your imagination is the limit.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 5670, 512 MB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Take on the hard yet fair world of Bloody Trapland. Jump, slide, dash and dodge your way through the many deadly levels. Find secrets, solve puzzles, unlock mysteries and unravel the story. Go at it alone or bring your friends along for a co-op experience like no other. 1-4 players online and/or splitscreen.
supported_languages:
English*, Finnish*, Russian*, Swedish*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Japanese*, Hungarian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
